Detailed Description

Utilities for breaking up boxes during partitioning.

bool SAMRAI::mesh::BalanceBoxBreaker::breakOffLoad ( hier::BoxContainer &  breakoff,
hier::BoxContainer &  leftover,
double &  brk_load,
const hier::Box &  box,
double  box_load,
const std::vector< double > &  corner_weights,
double  ideal_load,
double  low_load,
double  high_load,
double  threshold_width 
) const

Break off a given load size from a given Box.

Attempt to break off the ideal_load, or at least a load inside the range [low_load, high_load].

Parameters:
[out] breakoff Boxes broken off (usually just one).
[out] leftover Remainder of box after breakoff is gone.
[out] brk_load The load broken off.
[in] box Box to break.
[in] corner_weights Fraction of the total load associated with each corner.
[in] box_load Load of the box before breaking.
[in] ideal_load Ideal load to break.
[in] low_load 
[in] high_load 
[in] threshold_width Try to avoid making boxes thinner than this width in any direction.
Returns:
whether a successful break was made.
Precondition:
ideal_load_to_break > 0

References SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::clear(), computeBalancePenalty(), computeWidthScore(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::empty(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxUtilities::findBadCutPoints(), SAMRAI::mesh::PartitioningParams::getBadInterval(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::getBlockId(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::getDim(), SAMRAI::mesh::PartitioningParams::getDomainBoxes(), SAMRAI::tbox::Dimension::getValue(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::numberCells(), SAMRAI::tbox::plog, SAMRAI::hier::Box::size(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::swap(), and TBOX_ASSERT.

void SAMRAI::mesh::BalanceBoxBreaker::burstBox ( hier::BoxContainer &  boxes,
const hier::Box &  bursty,
const hier::Box &  solid 
) [static]

Break up box bursty against box solid and adds the pieces in the given container.

This version differs from that in BoxContainer in that it tries to minimize slivers.

References SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::clear(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::contains(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::isSpatiallyEqual(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::lower(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::numberCells(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::push_back(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::setLower(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::setUpper(), TBOX_ASSERT, and SAMRAI::hier::Box::upper().
